title: What are Lil Wayne's biggest hits? - Quora

response.answer_text: In terms of digital sales (and this list can change week to week due to totals), it would be:DROP THE WORLD LOLLIPOP GOT MONEY A MILLI RIGHT ABOVE IT PROM QUEEN  Hope this helps!Best,Eric More more more music news - follow me on Twitter - www.twitter.com/ThatEricAlper
